snippet: The Day: Politicians routinely summon family ghosts as proof of authenticity, and Christine C. Quinn's Titanic remembrances have given her a big jump on her potential rivals.
abstract: The Day: Politicians routinely summon family ghosts as proof of authenticity, and Christine C. Quinn's Titanic remembrances have given her a big jump on her potential rivals.

headline.main: On the Campaign Trail, Reciting Family History
